All Classes and Interfaces

类
说明
App
JavaFX Application class
BaseScene
A Base Scene used in the game.
BlockClickedListener
The Block Clicked listener is used to handle the event when a block in a GameBoard is clicked.
ChallengeScene
The Single Player challenge scene.
CommunicationsListener
The Communications Listener is used for listening to messages received by the communicator.
Communicator
Uses web sockets to talk to a web socket server and relays communication to attached listeners
Game
The Game class handles the main logic, state and properties of the TetrECS game.
GameBlock
The Visual User Interface component representing a single block in the grid.
GameBlockCoordinate
Represents a row and column representation of a block in the grid.
GameBoard
A GameBoard is a visual component to represent the visual GameBoard.
GameLoopListener
The Game Loop Listener is used to pass on the time for the current game loop
GamePane
The Game Pane is a special pane which will scale anything inside it to the screen and maintain the aspect ratio.
GamePiece
Instances of GamePiece Represents the model of a specific Game Piece with it's block makeup.
GameWindow
The GameWindow is the single window for the game where everything takes place.
Grid
The Grid is a model which holds the state of a game board.
InstructionsScene
The instruction scene.
Launcher
This Launcher class is used to allow the game to be built into a shaded jar file which then loads JavaFX.
Leaderboard
The Visual User Interface component displaying the leaderboard
LineClearedListener
The Line Cleared Listener is called when a line is cleared and pass them to fade them out
LivesListener
The Lives Listener is called when there is no more lives
LobbyList
The Visual User Interface component displaying the lobby components
LobbyScene
The lobby scene.
MenuScene
The main menu of the game.
Multimedia
 
MultiplayerGame
 
MultiplayerScene
multiplayer scene
NextPieceListener
The Next Piece Listener is called when the piece on piece boards are updated
PieceBoard
The Visual User Interface component displaying the pieces
RightClickedListener
The RightClicked Listener is called when the right mouse button is triggered
ScoreFileHandler
handles score files
ScoresList
container for scores boxes to display all scores
ScoresScene
Scene to display scores at the end of the game.
